name: Match War
description:
Match War - This is a simple match-3 plus war game. The game has three ways to play: pass, defeat, and hold on. Players need to change the soldiers or heroes who fight to win.

Of course, players can blindly combine soldiers to win, or they can choose appropriate soldiers to win easily according to the game situation.

Now each challenge has twenty-five levels, that is, the game has seventy-five levels to play.

Update before launch
Added five endless levels
Added eighteen achievements
